resources.string: Fill this field with your name..
Fill this field with your email..
Double check your username and password
Fill this field with short description

TrashUp is a mobile application designed to streamline waste bank operations and enhance community involvement in waste management. It helps users manage their waste effectively by providing features such as user profiles, waste collection schedules, and more.
How do I update my profile information?

To update your profile information:
 1. Open the app and go to the profile section.
 2. Click on the "Edit Profile" button.
 3. Update your name, phone number, date of birth, and address.
 4. Save your changes.
How do I select my date of birth?

You can select your date of birth using the calendar feature:

1. Click on the date of birth field.
 2. A calendar will appear. Select your birth date from the calendar.
 3. The selected date will be formatted and displayed in the "yyyy-MM-dd" format..

A waste bank is a community-driven initiative where residents can deposit their recyclable waste and earn points or money in return. It helps promote recycling and reduces the amount of waste sent to landfills.
What types of waste can I deposit?
The types of waste you can deposit include paper, plastic, metal, glass, and electronic waste. Check the app for specific details on accepted materials.
What types of waste can I deposit?
The types of waste you can deposit include paper, plastic, metal, glass, and electronic waste. Check the app for specific details on accepted materials.
How do I redeem my points or rewards?
You can redeem your points or rewards by going to the "Rewards" section in the app. Select the reward you want to redeem, and follow the instructions provided.
